Title: worst camera ever!
Cons:
The usb connection wont fit properly into camera to transfer photos. 
just terrible!
I purchased a Kodak Mini Charger an 2 AA Ni-MH batteries but they won't power the unit. It doesn't work!!!
Their own rechargeable batteries don't work with their camera.
How insane is that?
I'm returning this when I get back from vacation.
At the rate this thing is eating through batteries, I'm out another $30 in AA batteries plus the cost of the charger and Ni-MH batteries.
Comments:
Do not purchase this camera! 
No matter what it costs!!!

Title: Slim, compact, quality camera
Cons: Zoom could have been optical instead of digital (size would have to be bigger for this to be possible) i had to find A con for it.
Pros: Everything that you would want in a camera: ease of use, responsive, good image quality, small size(not smallest but close) yet has a big view screen which is nice. Auto focus works well, unlike most that i have used. Reviewing pictures is easy and simple. I would definitely purchase this again
Comments:
If you are in the market for a camera I highly recommend it, you won't be disappointed. Except if you are that one guy that seems to find fault in pretty much anything. (FYI I have no ties with Kodak nor NewEgg.) Thanks for leaving reviews so i can purchase smarter.

That1Guy

Title: Nice cheap camera
Cons: Zoom not what I would like it to be........
Pros: Wont get much better for your money, nice software interface, my non-techie wife had it set up and was editing photos in about three minutes.
Comments: Worth the price.  Great point and shoot camera,
